plot: When our heroes head to Lokar's lair to commandeer his Kairu, Ky accidentally releases the energy... and causes Lokar's lair to explode!
title: "RedaKai" The Fall of Lokar
plot_es: When our heroes head to Lokar's lair to commandeer his Kairu, Ky accidentally releases the energy... and causes Lokar's lair to explode!
plot_en: When our heroes head to Lokar's lair to commandeer his Kairu, Ky accidentally releases the energy... and causes Lokar's lair to explode!
